Articulating Surfaces: Sternal end of clavicle
Manubrium of sternum and part of 1st costal cartilage
Lateral aspect of clavicle (oval shaped facet)
Medial aspect of acromion
Ligaments: Coracoclavicular (2 parts – trapezoid and conoid ligaments) – accessory

Articulating Surfaces: Glenoid cavity of scapula
Head of humerus

Trochlea of humerus with the trochlear fossa of the ulna
Capitulum of humerus with head of radius
Head of radius with a 'sleeve', formed by radial notch of the ulna and the annular ligament
Head of ulna to ulnar notch to radius and articular disk
Distal end of radius and articular disks, with scaphiod, lunate and triquetrum
proximal row of carpal bones with distal row of carpal bones
Trapezium and base of 1st metacarpal
Heads of metacarpals with bases of proximal phalanges
Heads of metacarpals with bases of proximal phalanges
heads of proximal phalanges 2-5 with bases of middle phalanges 2-5
Heads of middle phalanges 2-5 with bases of distal phalanges 2-5
Head of proximal phalanx of thumb, base of distal phalanx of thumb
head of femur with acetabulum of pelvis (lunate surface) deepened by acetabular labrum
Auricular surface of ilium with auricular surface of sacrum
Pubic bones (hyaline cartilage), symphyseal surfaces (fibrocartilage disc)
